name: 古斯塔夫·基尔霍夫
bio_short: 德国物理学家，他对电路、光谱学和黑体辐射做出了根本性贡献。他提出了“基尔霍夫电路定律”，与本生一同开创了“光谱分析”，并定义了“黑体辐射”问题。
bio_short_en: A German physicist who made fundamental contributions to electrical circuits, spectroscopy, and black-body radiation. He formulated 'Kirchhoff's circuit laws', co-founded 'spectroscopy' with Bunsen, and defined the 'black-body' problem.
